message.body: also boyhood was a masterpiece. Link later deserves all the director awards.
Yeah you nailed it. I am gunna see boyhood next weekend!!! Zach brads movie was the worst piece of crap I have ever seen. It was painful to watch

Haha I bet. I told Ryan Id watch on HBO and he said he would even do that so I guess he was right :) let me know how you like boyhood. It's three hours but honestly it's so good it doesn't feel like it. Kinda like life.
